> I get the feeling that we only need to add one featu=
re to 
> JUnit to have it match TestNG in this regard: labeling tests 
> as=
 "SetUp failed" when
> setUp() throws an exception. Right now, they are usu=
ally 
> reported as errors, and so are lumped in with other 
> unexpected e=
xceptions.

Yup, this would be a great improvement.  And while we're at it,=
 have JUnit
not run any test in this class and subclasses when this happens=
.

We're getting there!
